Translations.Text: This worldly zivot bol ziaden inak than vanity hraju chvila abode Hereafter bol real zivot they len zauzlit
When they ride ship they implore GOD devoting ich prayers Him! mat rad skoro mat rad He saves them shore they revert do idolatry
Let them disbelieve co my dat them let them enjoy temporarily; they robit iste zalozit out
they nie seen my have zriadit Sacred Sanctuary ze my robit zaistit chvila all around them ludia bol constant nebezpecenstuo? they still verit v falsehood Would zamietnut GOD's blessings
Kto zly than jeden fabricates laicky je attributes them GOD zavrhnut truth when it pojdem him? bol Hell nie iba retribution disbelievers
Mat rad for those strive do our zapricinit my iste guide them our chodnicek! vela assuredly GOD bol s the zbozny
